item.title: WATCH: WWII veteran celebrates 101st birthday by riding in plane he flew during war
item.description: World War II veteran BL Craighead Jr. celebrated his 101st birthday by taking to the skies in the same model type of plane he flew over 80 years ago.

item.title: WATCH: New video of person of interest in Ohio dentist murder released
item.description: Ohio authorities have released new video of a person of interest after a dentist and his wife were found murdered inside their home on Dec. 30.

item.title: Flu activity in US could continue to rise for weeks, top CDC epidemiologist says
item.description: Flu activity could continue to increase in the U.S. over the next few weeks, according to a top flu epidemiologist at the CDC.

item.title: Republican Rep. Doug LaMalfa dies at 65
item.description: California Republican Rep. Doug LaMalfa has died at the age of 65.

item.title: WATCH: Display of continuity amongst Venezuelan leadership after Maduro's arraignment
item.description: ABC News' James Longman reports there is "a sense that not much perhaps has changed in Venezuela" after ousted leader Nicolas Maduro was arraigned in ...
